website_summaries.verdict: Moderately priced for such a well-made motherboard that focuses on connectivity and a smooth user experience, making this mid-range option a valuable investment.
pros: Slick stainless steel design and RGB LED features
cons: Not the best motherboard for overclocking

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a new Ryzen 7 3700x build. Almost enough fan connectors. Rock stable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with air cooler
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use with my 3600 CPU with the provided ryzen air cooler. If you are not using an AIO then you can only use two DIMMs of ram. Luckily it uses a2 and b2 channels but if you want to go 4x8 rather than 2x16 you cannot do so on this motherboard.
customer_reviews.author: Derek M

customer_reviews.title: working good so far
customer_reviews.text: good mobo not alot of fan connections and the cpu cooler and ram is a tight squeeze if u go 4 sticks but its works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check your RAM height
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this board for almost a year, only a few things to note. I originally wanted to use a Noctua air cooler, but opted for an AIO from Corsair after encountering mounting issues. My memory modules were too close to the heat pipes for proper mounting. I was and am still using Trident Z Royal 16gb modules, which are relatively tall. I'm still using it today, with my Ryzen 9 3900X.
customer_reviews.author: Waylon Jay Dorris

customer_reviews.title: Had alot of problems with Ryzen 3700X
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this board as it had numerous problems with my AMD Ryzen 3700X build.
customer_reviews.author: XCOM4

customer_reviews.title: dead board
customer_reviews.text: After first installing this board, it was wonderful. Then it would shut down during use, only way to restart was remove the power and restart. Eventually it would not start at all. After dealing with Amazon and manufacturer support, I returned. I would like to have another, but am reluctant.
customer_reviews.author: jones

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: received the board and removed from electrostatic bag and the lower heatsink fell completely off the board. Amazon quickly set up an RMA and refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good performance
customer_reviews.text: Raun well. I would recommend getting DDR4 3600 or above. Works great. Easy and simple Bios.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Onderick

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Booted up first time no issues at all after gaming heavily for weeks now. Amazon let me return my first one no questions asked. I will only buy from Amazon from now on. Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: No issues 3800x, with a 2080 super. Had to reseed the graphics card on install but it was my first PC build.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: x570 motherboard
customer_reviews.text: Best for the money... everything works in Bios for overclocking.. :)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Ladely

customer_reviews.title: Another doa
customer_reviews.text: Doa Mobo. Returned and got full store credit. Got a different x570 board that worked
customer_reviews.author: Anaconda

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, runs good
customer_reviews.text: Board itself works great but the polychrome software is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Kick ass board, No wi-fi.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this motherboard 5 stars however, the wi-fi module does not come with it nor is it on board. For the price it's a kick ass board.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Vargas

product_meta.title: ASRock AM4/X570 Extreme4/HDMI/M.2/USB3.2 Motherboard
product_meta.description: Hyper M. 2 socket to support next generation PCIe Gen4 x4 M. 2 SSDs. A massive full coverage M. 2 Heatsink to dissipate heat ef ciently and ensure your high speed M. 2 SSD always working at its best.
feature_bullets: Supports AMD AM4 Socket Ryzen 2000 and 3000 Series processors
10 Power Phase Design, Supports DDR4 4666+ (OC); 2 PCIe 4. 0 x16, 3 PCIe 4. 0 x1, 1 M. 2(Key E) For WiFi
AMD Quad CrossFireX and CrossFireX ; 7. 1 CH HD Audio (Realtek ALC1220 Audio Codec), Supports DTS Connect
8 SATA3, 1 Hyper M. 2 (PCIe Gen4 x4 & SATA3), 1 Hyper M. 2 (PCIe Gen4 x4)
7. 1 CH HD Audio (Realtek ALC1220 Audio Codec), Supports DTS Connect
2 USB 3. 2 Gen2 (Rear Type A+C), 11 USB 3. 2 Gen1 (4 Front, 6 Rear, 1 Front Type-C)
Graphics Output Options: HDMI.Supports NVMe SSD as boot disks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars63 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
